variants.Description in input context: These variants, A147T and T168M, were found to be associated with Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_000043.5:c.[A147T, T168M] in both HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for both HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
